encyclopedia/germ_pzkpfw_Maus/desc;"An experimental super-heavy tank built in Germany towards the end of the war. The project was developed by Ferdinand Porsche.
The first tank was assembled at the Alkett factory in Berlin on August 1
The first trial run of the Type 205/1 tank was conducted on December 24
column2: 1943. The turret still wasn’t ready
column3: so a load equal to the weight of the turret was placed on top of the tank. The prototype turned out to be quite maneuverable once it was able to leave the assembly area
column4: where it had been rather cramped. According to those who had the opportunity to drive the tank
column5: the Maus was easier to drive than the Pz.Kpfw. IV.

column1: In November
column2: 1943 a 44 caliber
column3: 128mm KwK 44 cannon was built that was intended for the tank. The cannon’s designation was later changed to 12.8 cm KwK 82. The weapon was tested at the Meppen training ground. The turret was installed on the 205/1 prototype on July 6
column5: and on October 3
column6: 1944 the armament was installed and the fully-outfitted tank was tested at the training ground in Kummersdorf.

column1: Both prototypes were tested in Kummersdorf
column2: but no reliable information on these tests is available. Whether or not experimental firing was conducted is also unknown.

column1: Toward the end of the war
column2: bodies and turrets had begun to be produced in addition to the prototypes that had been built.

column1: As the Soviet troops were approaching in 1945 both prototypes were blown up. Soviet specialists were able to reconstruct one Maus from the wreckage. This rebuilt tank was delivered to the training ground in Kubinka in 1946
column2: where various tests were performed.

column1: The Panzerkampfwagen Maus can currently be viewed on display at the tank museum in Kubinka.";"Un char super-lourds expérimental construit en Allemagne vers la fin de la guerre. Le projet a été développé par Ferdinand Porsche. Le premier char fut assemblé à l'usine de la société Alkett à Berlin le 1er août 1943.
Le premier essai du char de Type 205/1 a été menée le 24 décembre 1943. La tourelle n'était pas encore prête
column2: donc une charge égale au poids de la tourelle a été placée sur le dessus de la caisse. Le prototype s'est avéré être très maniable une fois qu'il a pu quitter la zone d'assemblage
column3: où il était plutôt à l'étroit. Selon ceux qui ont eu l'occasion de conduire le char
column4: le Maus était plus facile à conduire que le Pz.Kpfw. IV.

column1: En novembre 1943
column2: un canon de 128mm KwK 44 a été construit comme convenu pour le char. La désignation du canon a été plus tard changée en 12
column3: 8 cm KwK 82. L'arme a été testée sur le terrain d'entraînement de Meppen. La tourelle a été installée sur le prototype de 205/1 le 6 juillet 1944 et le 3 octobre 1944 l'armement a été installé et le char entièrement équipé fut testé à l'entraînement au sol à Kummersdorf.

column1: Les deux prototypes furent testés à Kummersdorf
column2: mais aucune informations fiables sur ces tests n'est disponible. Si oui ou non des tirs expérimentaux furent réalisées est également inconnue.

column1: Vers la fin de la guerre
column2: les tourelles et les châssis avaient commencés par être produite en plus les prototypes qui ont été construis. Comme les troupes soviétiques se rapprochaient
column4: les deux prototypes ont été dynamités. Les spécialistes soviétiques ont pu reconstruire un Maus de l'épave. Ce char reconstruit a été livré terrain d'entrainement de Kubinka en 1946
column5: où divers essais furent réalisés. Le Panzerkampfwagen Maus est actuellement consultable à l'exposition au Musée du char de Kubinka.";"Questo era un carro super pesante sperimentale costruito in Germania verso la fine della guerra. Il progetto venne sviluppato da Ferdinand Porsche.

column1: Il primo carro fu assemblato alla fabbrica Alkett di Berlino il 1 Agosto 1943.

I primi collaudi del carro Tipo 205/1 venne effettuato il 24 Dicembre del 1943. La torretta non era ancora pronta così vennero utilizzati dei pesi corrispondenti alla futura torretta sullo scafo. Il prototipo si dimostrò abbastanza manovrabile dopo aver oltrepassato la parte più angusta dell'area d'assemblaggio. Secondo i tecnici che hanno potuto guidare il Maus
column2: confermarono che era più facile da guidare del Pz.Kpfw. IV.

column1: Nel Novembre del 1943 venne costruito il cannone KwK 44 da 128mm che avrebbe dovuto equipaggiare il carro. La designazione fu poi cambiata in 12.8cm KwK82. L'arma venne provata al poligono di Meppen. La torretta venne installata sul prototipo 205/1 il 6 luglio del 1944 ed il 3 ottobre fu la volta del cannone che completarono così il Maus per le prove a Kummersdorf.
Entrambi i prototipi furono testati a Kummersdorf ma non vi sono informazioni affidabili disponibili su di essi così come se sono stati condotti o meno delle prove di fuoco sperimentali.
Fino alla fine della guerra
column2: gli scafi e le torrette sono state prodotte oltre ai prototipi già costruiti. Quando le truppe sovietiche si avvicinarono ai due prototipi nel 1945
column3: vennero fatti detonare. Gli specialisti sovietici furono capaci di ricostruire un Maus dai rottami. Questo carro ricostruito fu spedito alla base di addestramento di Kubinka nel 1946
column4: vennero effettuati vari test.

column1: Il Panzerkampfwagen Maus può essere visitato presso il museo dei carri armati di Kubinka.";"Hinweis: Dieser Eintrag wird in Kürze auch auf Deutsch verfügbar sein.
An experimental super-heavy tank built in Germany towards the end of the war. The project was developed by Ferdinand Porsche.
The first tank was assembled at the Alkett factory in Berlin on August 1
The first trial run of the Type 205/1 tank was conducted on December 24
column2: 1943. The turret still wasn’t ready
column3: so a load equal to the weight of the turret was placed on top of the tank. The prototype turned out to be quite maneuverable once it was able to leave the assembly area
column4: where it had been rather cramped. According to those who had the opportunity to drive the tank
column5: the Maus was easier to drive than the Pz.Kpfw. IV.

column1: In November
column2: 1943 a 44 caliber
column3: 128mm KwK 44 cannon was built that was intended for the tank. The cannon’s designation was later changed to 12.8 cm KwK 82. The weapon was tested at the Meppen training ground. The turret was installed on the 205/1 prototype on July 6
column5: and on October 3
column6: 1944 the armament was installed and the fully-outfitted tank was tested at the training ground in Kummersdorf.

column1: Both prototypes were tested in Kummersdorf
column2: but no reliable information on these tests is available. Whether or not experimental firing was conducted is also unknown.

column1: Toward the end of the war
column2: bodies and turrets had begun to be produced in addition to the prototypes that had been built.

column1: As the Soviet troops were approaching in 1945 both prototypes were blown up. Soviet specialists were able to reconstruct one Maus from the wreckage. This rebuilt tank was delivered to the training ground in Kubinka in 1946
column2: where various tests were performed.

column1: The Panzerkampfwagen Maus can currently be viewed on display at the tank museum in Kubinka.";"An experimental super-heavy tank built in Germany towards the end of the war. The project was developed by Ferdinand Porsche.

column1: The Panzerkampfwagen Maus can currently be viewed on display at the tank museum in Kubinka.";"Опытный сверхтяжёлый танк
column2: созданный в Германии к концу войны по проекту Фердинанда Порше.

column1: Сборка первого танка началась на заводе Alkett в Берлине 1 августа 1943 года.
24 декабря 1943 года состоялся первый пробный выезд танка Type 205/1. К этому моменту башня ещё не была готова
column2: и вместо неё на танк установили груз
column3: соответствующий массе башни. Прототип показал весьма неплохую маневренность
column4: когда смог выехать из тесного для него монтажного зала. По мнению людей
column5: которым довелось управлять танком
column6: Maus был легче в управлении
column7: чем Рz.Крfw. IV.

column1: В ноябре 1943 года была готова пушка 12.8 cm KwK 44 калибра 128 мм
column2: предназначенная для танка. Позже обозначение пушки было изменено на 12.8 cm KwK 82. Испытания орудия проходили на полигоне в г. Меппен. 6 июня 1944 года на прототипе 205/1 была установлена башня
column3: а 3 октября 1944 года установлено вооружение и полностью укомплектованный танк был испытан на полигоне в Кумерсдорфе.

column1: В Кумерсдорфе испытывались оба прототипа
column2: но достоверной информации об этих испытаниях нет. Неизвестно также
column3: проводились ли опытные стрельбы.

column1: К концу войны
column2: кроме созданных прототипов
column3: также началось производство корпусов и башен.

column1: В 1945 году
column2: при приближении советских войск
column3: оба прототипа были взорваны. В итоге из этих двух взорванных танков
column4: советскими специалистами был вновь собран один ""Маус""
column5: который в 1946 году был доставлен на полигон в Кубинке
column6: где были проведены различные испытания.

column1: На данный момент танк Panzerkampfwagen Maus можно наблюдать в экспозиции танкового музея в Кубинке.";"Eksperymentalny czołg superciężki produkowany przez Niemcy w końcowym okresie wojny. Twórcą projektu był Ferdinand Porsche.
Montaż pierwszego czołgu został ukończony 1 sierpnia 1943 roku w zakładach Alkett w Berlinie.
Pierwsza jazda prototypu 205/1 odbyła się 24 grudnia 1943 roku. Jako
column2: że wieża czołgu wciąż nie była jeszcze ukończona
column3: na czołgu ułożono obciążenie o odpowiadającej jej masie. Po opuszczeniu przyciasnej montażowni prototyp okazał się mieć stosunkowo dużą manewrowość. Kierowcy mający okazję prowadzić czołg twierdzili
column4: że Maus był łatwiejszy w prowadzeniu niż PzKpfw IV.

column1: W listopadzie 1943 roku wyprodukowano specjalnie zaprojektowaną dla czołgu Maus armatę KwK 44 kal. 128 mm z lufą o długości 44 kalibrów. W późniejszym okresie oznaczenie armaty zmieniono na 12.8 cm KwK 82. Uzbrojenie czołgu testowane było na poligonie w Meppen. 6 lipca 1944 roku na prototypie
column2: oznaczonym 205/1
column3: zainstalowana została wieża. 3 października 1944 roku zamontowano w niej uzbrojenie i w pełni wyposażony czołg (wraz z drugim prototypem) testowano na poligonie w Kummersdorfie. Brak jest wiarygodnych informacji dotyczących przeprowadzonych prób
column4: nie wiadomo również
column5: czy przeprowadzono próby ogniowe.

column1: W miarę zbliżania się wojny ku końcowi do procesu produkcji wchodziły kolejne kadłuby i wieże.
W 1945 roku
column2: z chwilą podejścia pod fabrykę żołnierzy radzieckich oba gotowe prototypy zostały wysadzone. Inżynierom rosyjskim udało się z wraków zrekonstruować jeden czołg Maus. Ten odbudowany egzemplarz dostarczono do ośrodka badań w Kubince
column3: gdzie przeprowadzono różne testy. Obecnie pojazd ten można zobaczyć na wystawie w muzeum czołgów w Kubince.";"Překlad připravujeme";"An experimental super-heavy tank built in Germany towards the end of the war. The project was developed by Ferdinand Porsche.

column1: The Panzerkampfwagen Maus can currently be viewed on display at the tank museum in Kubinka.";"战\t争\t步\t向\t末\t期\t时\t，\t德\t国\t试\t制\t的\t超\t重\t型\t坦\t克\t。\t由\t斐\t迪\t南\t·\t波\t尔\t舍\t博\t士\t主\t导\t研\t发\t。\t
1943 \t年\t 8 \t月\t 1 \t日\t，\t位\t于\t柏\t林\t的\t阿\t尔\t凯\t特\t公\t司\t开\t始\t装\t配\t第\t一\t辆\t样\t车\t。\t
11 \t月\t，\t选\t用\t 128 \t毫\t米\t KwK 44 \t坦\t克\t炮\t（\t后\t改\t称\t 128 \t毫\t米\t KwK 82 \t坦\t克\t炮\t）\t为\t主\t炮\t，\t于\t梅\t彭\t试\t验\t场\t接\t受\t测\t试\t。\t

12 \t月\t 24 \t日\t，\t205 \t型\t 1 \t号\t试\t验\t车\t第\t一\t次\t试\t车\t。\t当\t时\t并\t没\t有\t浇\t铸\t炮\t塔\t，\t便\t以\t同\t等\t重\t量\t的\t混\t凝\t土\t炮\t塔\t替\t代\t。\t离\t开\t局\t促\t的\t装\t配\t间\t后\t，\t样\t车\t的\t操\t控\t性\t竟\t显\t得\t相\t当\t优\t秀\t—\t—\t据\t有\t幸\t驾\t驶\t过\t鼠\t式\t坦\t克\t的\t乘\t员\t叙\t述\t，\t甚\t至\t比\t驾\t驶\t四\t号\t坦\t克\t还\t轻\t松\t。\t
1944 \t年\t 7 \t月\t 6 \t日\t，\t安\t装\t 205 \t型\t 1 \t号\t试\t验\t车\t的\t炮\t塔\t。\t

10 \t月\t 3 \t日\t，\t武\t装\t完\t毕\t的\t样\t车\t于\t库\t默\t斯\t多\t夫\t试\t验\t场\t接\t受\t测\t试\t。\t虽\t然\t仅\t有\t的\t两\t辆\t样\t车\t都\t在\t此\t地\t，\t但\t从\t未\t流\t传\t出\t任\t何\t可\t信\t的\t测\t试\t记\t录\t，\t也\t无\t法\t知\t晓\t是\t否\t进\t行\t过\t射\t击\t测\t试\t。\t
\t战\t争\t临\t近\t尾\t声\t时\t，\t德\t国\t开\t始\t制\t造\t新\t的\t鼠\t式\t坦\t克\t底\t盘\t与\t炮\t塔\t。\t
1945 \t年\t，\t随\t着\t苏\t军\t兵\t临\t城\t下\t，\t两\t辆\t样\t车\t被\t德\t方\t炸\t毁\t。\t但\t苏\t联\t专\t家\t修\t复\t了\t其\t中\t一\t辆\t。\t
1946 \t年\t，\t这\t辆\t仅\t存\t的\t八\t号\t坦\t克\t被\t送\t往\t位\t于\t库\t宾\t卡\t的\t试\t验\t场\t，\t接\t受\t各\t种\t测\t试\t。\t

\t今\t日\t，\t鼠\t式\t坦\t克\t陈\t列\t在\t库\t宾\t卡\t博\t物\t馆\t，\t供\t世\t人\t参\t观\t。";"最初の\t戦車は\t1943年\t8月\t1日に\tベルリンの\tアルケット\t社の\t工場で\t組み\t立てられました。\t1943年\t12月\t24日、\tタイプ\t205/1\tの\t最初の\t試運転が\t行われました。\t砲塔はまだ\t用意されていなかったので、\t代わりに\t砲塔と\t同じ\t重量の\t積荷が\t戦車の\t上に\t置かれました。\t試作車両は\t窮屈な\t集合区域を\t出た\t途端、\t高い\t機動性を\t見せ\t付けました。\tこの\t戦車を\t操縦する\t機会を\t得た\t者によると、\tPz.Kpfw. IVよりも\tマウスのほうが\t操作しやすかったといいます。\t1943年の\t11月、\tこの\t戦車に\t搭載することを\t予定して\t44口径の\t128mm KwK44戦車砲が\t製造されました。\tこの\t戦車砲の\t型名は\t後に\t変更され、\t12.8 cm KwK 82\tになります。\t兵器の\t試験は\tメッペンの\t試験場で\t行われました。\t1944年\t7月\t6日に\t試作車両\t205/1\tに\t砲塔が\t搭載されました。\tそして、\t1944年\t10月\t3日、\tクンマースドルフで、\t武装が\t搭載され、\t装備の\t完成した\t戦車の\t試験が\t行われました。\tクンマースドルフでは\t2\tつの\t試作車両の\t試験が\t行われましたが、\tこの\t試験に\t関する\t確かな\t情報は\t確認できていません。\t砲撃試験が\t行われたかどうかも\t不明です。\t戦争が\t終わる\t少し\t前に、\t製造されていた\t試作車両に\t加え、\tボディと\t砲塔の\t製造が\t始まりました。\tしかし、\t赤軍が\t近づいていたために、\t1945年にはどちらの\t試作車両も\t爆破処分されてしまいました。\tその\t後、\tソ\t連の\t専門家たちは、\t残骸の\t中から、\tマウスを\t1両再構築することができました。\t修復されたこの\t戦車は\t1946年に\tクベンカの\t試験場に\t送られ、\tそこで\t様々な\t試験が\t行われました。\t超重戦車\tマウスは\t現在も\tクビンカ\t戦車博物館に\t展示されており、\t実際に\t見ることができます。";"An experimental super-heavy tank built in Germany towards the end of the war. column1: У листопаді 1943 року була готова гармата 12.8 cm KwK 44 калібру 128 мм

column1: У Кумерсдорфі випробовувалися обидва прототипи

column1: A Panzerkampfwagen Maus jelenleg a Kubinkai Harckocsimúzeum kiállításán tekinthető meg.";"설명이 준비중입니다.";"Апісанне не гатова";"An experimental super-heavy tank built in Germany towards the end of the war. The project was developed by Ferdinand Porsche.
The first tank was assembled at the Alkett factory in Berlin on August 1
The first trial run of the Type 205/1 tank was conducted on December 24
column2: 1943. The turret still wasn’t ready
column3: so a load equal to the weight of the turret was placed on top of the tank. The prototype turned out to be quite maneuverable once it was able to leave the assembly area
column4: where it had been rather cramped. According to those who had the opportunity to drive the tank
column5: the Maus was easier to drive than the Pz.Kpfw. IV.

column1: In November
column2: 1943 a 44 caliber
column3: 128mm KwK 44 cannon was built that was intended for the tank. The cannon’s designation was later changed to 12.8 cm KwK 82. The weapon was tested at the Meppen training ground. The turret was installed on the 205/1 prototype on July 6
column5: and on October 3
column6: 1944 the armament was installed and the fully-outfitted tank was tested at the training ground in Kummersdorf.

column1: Both prototypes were tested in Kummersdorf
column2: but no reliable information on these tests is available. Whether or not experimental firing was conducted is also unknown.

column1: Toward the end of the war
column2: bodies and turrets had begun to be produced in addition to the prototypes that had been built.

column1: As the Soviet troops were approaching in 1945 both prototypes were blown up. Soviet specialists were able to reconstruct one Maus from the wreckage. This rebuilt tank was delivered to the training ground in Kubinka in 1946
column2: where various tests were performed.

encyclopedia/germ_leopard_I/desc;"Development of the tank began in 1957 in cooperation with France. However
column2: this attempt to create a unified European tank was unsuccessful. The projects in both countries were conducted virtually in parallel
column3: but in 1963
column4: before the end of comparative testing of the French and German tanks
column5: Germany declined to cooperate further with France. Each country began to build its own national tank — the Leopard in Germany
column6: the AMX-30 in France.

column1: During the development of the Leopard 1 among all combat characteristics preference was given to firepower and mobility. Later
column2: due to the German engineers’ changing perspective on the significance of tank defenses in modern combat
column3: a number of steps were taken to increase it.

column1: The first production order of 1
column2: 500 tanks was placed in 1963
column3: and in September
column4: 1965 the first serial Leopard 1 was delivered to the Bundeswehr.";"Le développement du char a commencé en 1957 en coopération avec la France. Cependant
column5: cette tentative de créer un char européen a échoué. Les projets dans les deux pays furent pratiquement menées en parallèle
column6: mais en 1963
column7: avant la fin des essais comparatifs des chars français et allemands
column8: l’Allemagne refusa de coopérer davantage avec la France. Chaque pays a commencé à construire son propre char national — le Léopard en Allemagne
column9: l'AMX-30 en France.

column1: Au cours du développement du Léopard 1
column2: parmi toutes les caractéristiques de combats
column3: la priorité fut donnée à la puissance de feu et à la mobilité. Plus tard
column4: en raison du changement de point de vue des ingénieurs allemands sur l'importance de la défense des chars de combat modernes
column5: un certain nombre de mesures ont été pris pour l'augmenter. La première commande de production de 1 500 chars a été commandé en 1963
column6: et en septembre
column8: la première série Léopard 1 a été livré à la Bundeswehr.";"Lo sviluppo di questo carro iniziò nel 1957 in cooperazione con la Francia. Tuttavia
column9: questo tentativo di creare un carro armato europeo unico non ebbe successo. I progetti furono condotti virtualmente in parallelo nei due paesi
column10: ma nel 1963
column11: poco prima della fine dei test comparativi dei carri tedeschi e francesi
column12: la Germania si rifiutò di continuare a cooperare con la Francia. Entrambi gli stati cominciarono a produrre il proprio carro nazionale — il Leopard in Germania
column13: l'AMX-30 in Francia.

column1: Durante lo sviluppo del Leopard 1 fu data la precedenza a potenza di fuoco e mobilità. Più tardi
column2: in seguito a un cambio di prospettiva degli ingegneri tedeschi sul significato delle misure di protezione di un carro nel combattimento moderno
column3: furono sviluppate diverse soluzioni per incrementarle.

column1: Il primo ordine di produzione per 1500 carri fu disposto nel 1963
column2: e nel Settembre 1965 il primo Leopard 1 di serie fu consegnato al Bundeswehr.";"Hinweis: Dieser Eintrag wird in Kürze auch auf Deutsch verfügbar sein.

column4: 1965 the first serial Leopard 1 was delivered to the Bundeswehr.";"Разработка танка началась в 1957 году совместно с Францией. Однако попытка создания единого европейского танка не увенчалась успехом. Практически работы в обеих странах велись параллельно

column1: При разработке танка Леопард 1 среди всех боевых свойств предпочтение было отдано огневой мощи и подвижности. В дальнейшем
column2: с изменением взглядов немецких конструкторов на значение защищённости танка в современном бою

column4: связанных с повышением её уровня.

column2: а в сентябре 1965 года первый серийный танк Leopard 1 передали бундесверу.";"Początki Leoparda sięgają 1957 roku

column1: Początkowo w trakcie prac rozwojowych nad Leopardem konstruktorzy kładli główny nacisk na siłę ognia oraz mobilność. W miarę jednak jak niemieccy inżynierzy zaczęli dostrzegać kluczową rolę systemów obronnych na współczesnym polu walki
column2: podjęto szereg kroków mających na celu zapewnienie dostatecznej osłony przed pociskami przeciwnika.

";"Překlad připravujeme";"Tankın üretimi 1957 yılında Fransa işbirliği ile başladı.Ancak bu ortak Avrupa tankı oluşturma girişimi başarısızlıkla sonuçlandı.Her iki ülkede fiilen birlikte çalışmaya devam etti.Fakat Almanya Fransız ve Alman tanklarının kıyaslanmasından önce Fransa ile daha fazla iş birliği yapmayı kabul etmedi.Bunun ardından her iki ülke kendi ulusal tankını üretmeye başladı.Almanya için Leopard Fransa için AMX-30.Leopard 1'in geliştirme sürecinde bütün savaş öncelikleri atış gücü ve hareketlilik üzerineydi.Daha sonra Alman mühendislerin bakış açısı ve modern savaşta tank savunmasının öneminden dolayı bu özellikleri geliştirmek için birkaç adım daha atıldı.İlk üretim siparişi 1500 adet olmakla birlikte 1963 yılında verildi ve 1965 yılının Eylül ayında ilk Leopard 1 serisi tank Bundeswehr'e teslim edildi.";"1957 \t年\t，\t西\t德\t与\t法\t国\t开\t始\t共\t同\t研\t发\t一\t款\t新\t型\t坦\t克\t。\t两\t国\t各\t自\t独\t立\t开\t展\t研\t发\t工\t作\t，\t备\t选\t最\t终\t方\t案\t。\t1963 \t年\t，\t在\t对\t比\t测\t试\t即\t将\t结\t束\t之\t前\t，\t西\t德\t拒\t绝\t同\t法\t国\t继\t续\t合\t作\t，\t欧\t洲\t坦\t克\t项\t目\t最\t终\t下\t马\t。\t双\t方\t各\t自\t发\t展\t出\t本\t国\t的\t新\t型\t战\t车\t—\t—\t西\t德\t的\t“\t豹\t”\t1\t，\t法\t国\t的\t AMX-30\t。\t

column1: \t研\t发\t中\t的\t“\t豹\t”\t1 \t原\t本\t侧\t重\t于\t机\t动\t与\t火\t力\t。\t而\t后\t，\t研\t发\t人\t员\t意\t识\t到\t了\t在\t现\t代\t战\t争\t中\t，\t防\t护\t对\t坦\t克\t的\t意\t义\t，\t便\t改\t变\t了\t观\t念\t，\t采\t取\t了\t诸\t多\t增\t强\t防\t御\t的\t改\t进\t。\t
1963 \t年\t，\t西\t德\t政\t府\t订\t购\t了\t 1
column2: 500 \t辆\t“\t豹\t”\t1 \t主\t战\t坦\t克\t。\t1965 \t年\t，\t第\t一\t批\t量\t产\t型\t出\t厂\t，\t交\t付\t联\t邦\t国\t防\t军\t。";"この\t戦車の\tフランスとの\t共同開発は\t1957年に\t始まりました。\tしかし、\tヨーロッパの\t統一された\t戦車を\t作ろうという\t試みは\t失敗に\t終わりました。\t実際のところ、\t開発は\t両国が\t平行する\t形で\t行われていましたが、\t1963年、\tフランスと\tドイツが\t開発した\t戦車の\t比較試験を\t前に、\tドイツが\tフランスとのそれ\t以上の\t協力を\t拒んでしまいました。\t各国は、\tそれぞれに\t独自の\t戦車を\t開発し、\tドイツでは\tレオパルト、\tフランスでは\tAMX-30\tが\t製造されました。\tレオパルト\t1\tの\t開発に\t際して、\t戦闘に\t関する\t性能は\t全て\t火力と\t機動性に\t注がれました。\t後に、\tドイツの\tエンジニアたちは\t近代の\t戦闘における\t戦車の\t防御面の\t重要性に\t対する\t見方を\t変えたため、\t防御力を\t強化するために\t多数の\t手段がとられました。\t1963年に、\t1500両という\t最初の\t製造注文を\t受け、\t1965年の\t9月には、\t第\t1\tバッチの\tレオパルト\t1\tが\tドイツ\t連邦軍に\t配備されました。";"Development of the tank began in 1957 in cooperation with France. encyclopedia/germ_flakpanzer_38t_Gepard/desc;"The Flakpanzer 38(t) self-propelled anti-air mount was a temporary transitional version that was used until the development of a real anti-air tank on the chassis of the Panzer IV was completed. The vehicle was produced from November
column2: 1943 to February
column3: 1944. The first 87Flakpanzer 38(t) AA vehicles appeared at the front in January
column4: 1944 and made up Flugabwehrzug (AA platoons) in tank divisions and tank grenadier divisions (sometimes in Waffen SS divisions such as the Hitlerjugend 12th Waffen SS division in Norway in 1944).

column1: In 1944-1945 Flakpanzer 38(t) AA vehicles were used actively on the Italian and Western Fronts
column2: where they were effective against low-flying aircraft.

column1: A total of 141 Flakpanzer 38(t) AA vehicles were released.";"La batterie anti-aériennes automotrice Flakpanzer 38 (t) est une version de transition temporaire qui a été utilisée jusqu'à ce que le développement d'un véritable char anti-aériens sur le châssis du Panzer IV ait été achevé. Le véhicule a été produit de novembre 1943 à février 1944. Les 87 premiers Flakpanzer 38 (t) sont apparus au front
column2: en janvier 1944 et ont constitué les Flugabwehrzug (pelotons AA) dans les divisions de chars et les divisions de Panzer-grenadiers (parfois dans des divisions de la Waffen-SS comme la 12ème division Waffen SS Hitlerjugend  en Norvège en 1944).  En 1944-1945
column3: les Flakpanzer 38 (t) ont été utilisés activement sur les Front Italiens et de l'Ouest
column4: où ils étaient efficaces contre les avions volants à basse altitude.

column1: Un total de 141 Flakpanzer 38(t) ont été livrés.";"L'antiaerea semovente Flakpanzer 38(t) era una versione provvisoria che fu utilizzata fino a che non venne completato lo sviluppo del vero carro antiaereo sullo scafo del Panzer IV. Questo veicolo venne prodotto dal novembre del 1943 al febbraio del 1944. I primi 87Flakpanzer 38(t) apparirono sul fronte nel gennaio del 1944 e formarono il Fliegerabwehrzug (plotoni AA) nelle divisioni corazzate e quelle granatiere (a volte nelle divisioni delle Waffen SS così come la 12^ Hitlerjugend Waffen SS in Norvegia nel 1944).
Nel 1944-1945 vennero utilizzati attivamente sul fronte Italiano ed Occidentale
column2: dove erano efficaci contro gli aerei a bassa quota.

column1: Vennero prodotti un totale di 141 Flakpanzer 38(t).";"Hinweis: Dieser Eintrag wird in Kürze auch auf Deutsch verfügbar sein.

Первые 87 ЗСУ Flakpanzer 38(t) появились на фронте в январе 1944 года и составляли Flugabwehrzug (взводы ПВО) в составе танковых дивизий и дивизий танковых гренадеров (иногда и в дивизиях Waffen SS
column3: например в 12-ой Waffen SS танковой дивизии ""Hitlerjugend"" в Норвегии в 1944 году).

column1: В 1944-1945 годах ЗСУ Flakpanzer 38(t) активно использовались в Италии и на Западном фронте
column2: показав хорошие результаты в борьбе с низколетящими самолётами.

column1: Всего было выпущено 141 ЗСУ Flakpanzer 38(t).";"Samobieżne działo przeciwlotnicze Flakpanzer 38(t) zostało stworzone w celu ochrony jednostek pancernych i zmotoryzowanych przed atakami lotnictwa z niskich pułapów
column2: głównie samolotów myśliwsko-bombowych. Był to „pojazd zastępczy” wytwarzany w miejsce wdrażanych do produkcji seryjnej zestawów przeciwlotniczych
column3: które budowano na podwoziu czołgu średniego PzKpfw IV – Flakpanzer 38(t) miał zatem stanowić tymczasowe wyposażenie jednostek obrony przeciwlotniczej dywizji pancernych do czasu wprowadzenia nowego uzbrojenia tego rodzaju.

column1: Pojazd był produkowany od listopada 1943 roku do lutego 1944 roku. Z pierwszych 87 egzemplarzy wysłanych na front
column2: w styczniu 1944 roku sformułowano plutony przeciwlotnicze „Panzer Fliegerabwehrzug”
column3: które wcielono do dywizji pancernych oraz dywizji grenadierów pancernych Wehrmachtu (czasami służyły one również w dywizjach Waffen SS
column4: np. w 12 Dywizji Pancernej SS „Hitlerjugend” stacjonującej w 1944 roku w Normandii). W latach 1944-1945 pojazdy te walczyły we Włoszech
column5: Francji oraz Belgii
column6: gdzie dowiodły swojej skuteczności.

encyclopedia/germ_nbfz_VI;"Neubaufahrzeug";"Neubaufharzeug";"Neubaufahrzeug";"Neubaufahrzeug";"Neubaufahrzeug";"Neubaufahrzeug";"Neubaufahrzeug";"Neubaufahrzeug";"Neubaufahrzeug";"Nb.Fz. \t坦\t克";"Neubaufahrzeug";"Neubaufahrzeug";"Neubaufahrzeug";"Neubaufahrzeug";"Neubaufahrzeug";"Neubaufarhzeug";"신형 전차";"Neubaufarhzeug";"Neubaufahrzeug";"Neubaufahrzeug";"Neubaufahrzeug";;

encyclopedia/germ_nbfz_VI/desc;"An experimental multi-turret medium tank. The first models were built in 1934. During construction the tank took on the designation of Neubaufahrzeug V (Nb.Fz.V) for the first two vehicles. The second series of three tanks had the designation Nb.Fz.VI.

In German military documentation the designation Panzerkampfwagen VII is also encountered; it was later replaced by Pz.Kpfw.IVnA (Panzerkampfwagen IV new Art). During the Norwegian campaign the tanks were also referred to in documents as Neubau-Pz.Kpfw.IV.

All three tanks of the second series were used during the Norwegian operation. They were officially part of the special tank battalion Panzer Abteilung zur besonderer Vervendung 40 (Pz.Abt1. Zb.V 40). The tanks were combined into one company under the command of Lt. Hans Horstmann. The official name of this subdivision in battalion documentation was Zug ""Plutos""
column2: but it was most commonly referred to by its commander’s name as Panzerzug ""Horstmann"". The company’s emblem was a mammoth’s head located in front of the driver’s cabin.";"Un char moyen expérimental multi-tourelle. Les premiers modèles ont été construits en 1934. Pendant la construction
column3: le char prit  la désignation des Neubaufahrzeug V (Nb.Fz.V) pour les deux premiers véhicules.  Les deuxième séries de trois chars avait la désignation Nb.Fz.VI. Dans des documents militaires allemands la désignation Panzerkampfwagen VII est également rencontrée ; Il a ensuite été remplacé par Pz.Kpfw.IVnA (Panzerkampfwagen IV nouvel Art). Au cours de la campagne de Norvège les chars étaient également dénommés dans les documents Neubau-Pz.Kpfw.IV. Les trois chars de la deuxième série ont été utilisés pendant l'opération norvégienne. Ils étaient officiellement partie du bataillon spécial de char
column4: la  Panzer Abteilung zur besonderer Vervendung 40 (Pz.Abt1. Zb.V
column5: 40).  Les chars ont été combinées en une seule compagnie sous le commandement du lieutenant Hans Horstmann. Le nom officiel de cette subdivision en documentation bataillon était Zug « Plutos »
column6: mais il a été plus couramment dénommé par le nom de son commandant Panzerzug « Horstmann. » Emblème de la compagnie était une tête de mammouth
column7: situé en face de la cabine du conducteur.";"Questo era un carro medio sperimentale a multi torretta. I primi modelli vennero costruiti nel 1934 e designato come Neubaufahrzeug V (Nb.Fz.V) per i primi due veicoli. La seconda serie di tre unità ebbe la designazione Nb.Fz.VI.

column1: Nelle documentazioni militari tedesche venne anche incontrata la designazione di Panzerkampfwagen VII; venne poi rimpiazzata in Pz.Kpfw.IVnA (Panzerkampfwagen IV neue kunst). Durante la campagna Norvegese i carri vennero anche denominati nei documenti come Neubau-Pz.Kpfw.IV.

Tutti e tre i carri della seconda serie vennero utilizzati durante le operazioni Norvegesi. Erano ufficialmente parte del battaglione dei carri speciali Panzer Abteilung zur besonderer Vervendung 40 (Pz.Abt1.Zb.V 40). Vennero riuniti in una compagnia sotto il comando del Ten. Hans Horstmann. Il nome ufficiale di questa sub-divisione era di Zug ""Plutos""
column2: ma più comunemente riferita al nome del suo comandante come Panzerzug ""Horstmann"". Lo stemma della compagnia era una testa di mammut piazzata di fronte alla cabina del pilota.";"Hinweis: Dieser Eintrag wird in Kürze auch auf Deutsch verfügbar sein.

column1: В немецкой военной документации также встречается обозначение Panzerkampfwagen VII

column1: Все три танка второй серии использовались в ходе норвежской операции. Официально они входили в состав танкового батальона специального назначения Panzer Abteilung zur besonderer Vervendung 40 (Pz.Abt1. Zb.V 40). Танки были сведены в один взвод под командованием лейтенанта Ганса Хорстмана (Hans Horstmann). Официальное название подразделения в батальонной документации – Zug ""Plutos""
column2: но чаще встречается Panzerzug ""Horstmann"" по имени командира. Эмблемой взвода было изображение головы мамонта

column1: \t在\t随\t后\t的\t量\t产\t中\t，\t首\t批\t两\t辆\t成\t车\t被\t命\t名\t为\t五\t号\t新\t型\t工\t程\t车\t（\tNb.Fz.V\t）\t，\t第\t二\t批\t三\t辆\t成\t车\t则\t被\t称\t为\t六\t号\t新\t型\t工\t程\t车\t。\t

Zb.V 40\t）\t下\t辖\t的\t一\t个\t排\t—\t—\t官\t方\t称\t之\t为\t“\t普\t特\t洛\t斯\t”\t排\t，\t由\t汉\t斯\t·\t霍\t斯\t特\t曼\t中\t尉\t指\t挥\t，\t故\t而\t通\t称\t为\t“\t霍\t斯\t特\t曼\t”\t装\t甲\t排\t。\t排\t徽\t为\t猛\t犸\t象\t头\t，\t绘\t于\t驾\t驶\t室\t前\t。";"試作多砲塔中戦車。\tこの\t戦車の\t最初の\t型が\t製造されたのは\t1934年です。\t開発中、\t初めて\t製造された\t2両には\tNeubaufahrzeug V (Nb.Fz.V)の\t型名が\t与えられました。\t第\t2弾の\t3両の\t型名は\tNb.Fz.VIです。\tドイツの\t軍事文書では、\tPanzerkampfwagen VIIという\t型名も\t見られます。\tこの\t型名は、\t後に\tPz.Kpfw.IVnA (Panzerkampfwagen IV new Art)へと\t変更されました。\tノルウェーの\t戦いの\t中では、\tこの\t戦車を\tNeubau-Pz.Kpfw.IVと\t記載する\t文書も\t存在します。\t第\t2弾の\t戦車\t3両は\t全て、\tノルウェーの\t軍事作戦で\t使用され、\t第\t40特別編成戦車大隊（Pz.Abt1. Zb.V 40）にも\t公式に\t配備されていました。\t戦車は\tHans Horstmann\t大将の\t指揮のもと、\t1\tつの\t隊となりました。\t大隊の\t資料に\t残るこの\t小隊の\t正式名称は\tZug“Plutos”ですが、\t指揮官の\t名である\tPanzerzug“Horstmann”という\t名称が\t最も\t広く\t知られています。\tこの\t小隊の\tエンブレム（記章）は\t運転室の\t正面に\t描かれた\tマンモスの\t頭でした。";"An experimental multi-turret medium tank. The first models were built in 1934. During construction the tank took on the designation of Neubaufahrzeug V (Nb.Fz.V) for the first two vehicles. The second series of three tanks had the designation Nb.Fz.VI.

In German military documentation the designation Panzerkampfwagen VII is also encountered; it was later replaced by Pz.Kpfw.IVnA (Panzerkampfwagen IV new Art). During the Norwegian campaign the tanks were also referred to in documents as Neubau-Pz.Kpfw.IV.

All three tanks of the second series were used during the Norwegian operation. They were officially part of the special tank battalion Panzer Abteilung zur besonderer Vervendung 40 (Pz.Abt1. Zb.V 40). The tanks were combined into one company under the command of Lt. Hans Horstmann. The official name of this subdivision in battalion documentation was Zug ""Plutos""
column2: but it was most commonly referred to by its commander’s name as Panzerzug ""Horstmann"". encyclopedia/germ_kanonenjagdpanzer/desc;"The project to develop the self-propelled antitank mount was begun in the mid-1950s by specialists from the companies Hanomag (Hannoversche Maschinenbau AG)  and Henschel (Rheinstahl Henschel AG). The base selected for the new vehicle was the Schützenpanzer Lang HS.30 armored transporter. The first prototype of the SPG with the designation Kanonenjagdpanzer 1-3 was assembled in 1959. The tests revealed significant flaws in the vehicle. As a result
column2: more work was done to refine it. The decision was made to arm the new SPG with a 90mm antitank cannon similar to the one installed on the American M47 Patton II. By 1961 each development company had built its own experimental model. Both models were presented for testing. After comparative testing
column3: as well as the merger of the two companies
column4: the decision was made to combine the efforts of the specialists from both companies in order to build a single experimental model. Work on the creation and testing of the new model continued until 1965. After all testing was complete in 1966 the new vehicle was accepted as part of the arsenal under the designation JPz 4-5. The SPG was built serially from 1966 to 1967. During its production the companies Hanomag and Henschel each built 385 vehicles.";"Le projet de développer le canon antichar automoteur a commencé dans le milieu des années 1950 par des spécialistes des sociétés Hanomag (Hannoversche Maschinenbau AG) et Henschel (Rheinstahl AG de Henschel). La base choisie pour le nouveau véhicule fut le transport blindé Schützenpanzer Lang HS.30. Le premier prototype de SPG avec la désignation Kanonenjagdpanzer 1-3 a été monté en 1959. Les essais ont révélé des lacunes importantes sur le véhicule. Ainsi
column5: plus de travail a été fait pour l'améliorer. La décision a été prise d'armer le nouveau SPG avec un canon antichar de 90 mm semblable à celui installée sur le M47 Patton II américain. En 1961
column6: chaque équipe de développement avait construit son propre modèle expérimental. Les deux modèles ont été présentés pour les tests. Après des essais comparatifs
column7: ainsi que la fusion des deux compagnies
column8: la décision fut prise de combiner les efforts déployés par les spécialistes des deux sociétés afin de construire un modèle expérimental unique. Le travail sur la création et l'essai du nouveau modèle a continué jusqu'en 1965. Une fois que tous les tests furent terminé en 1966 le nouveau véhicule fut accepté dans le cadre de l'arsenal sous la désignation JPz 4-5. Le SPG a été construit en série de 1966 à 1967. Au cours de sa production
column9: les entreprises Hanomag et Henschel construisent chacun 385 véhicules .";"Il progetto di sviluppare un semovente anticarro fu iniziato verso la metà degli anni '50 dalle compagnie Hanomag (Hannoversche Maschinenbau AG) ed Henschel (Rheinstahl Henschel AG). La base predisposta per il veicolo era la blindo da trasporto Schützenpanzer Lang HS.30. Il primo prototipo di semovente con la designazione di Kanonenjagdpanzer 1-3 venne assemblato nel 1959. Le prove rivelarono difetti significativi nel veicolo. Di conseguenza
column10: venne fatto molto lavoro per affinarlo. Venne presa la decisione di armare il nuovo carro con un cannone da 90mm anticarro simile a quello dell'M47 Patton II. Dal 1961
column11: ogni compagnia sviluppò il suo modello sperimentale. Entrambi i modelli vennero presentati per le prove. Dopo i test comparativi
column12: così come la fusione delle due società
column13: venne presa la decisione di combinare gli sforzi degli specialisti per costruire un singolo modello sperimentale. Il lavoro alla creazione ed alla prova del nuovo modello continuò fino al 1965. Dopo il completamento di tutti i test
column14: il nuovo veicolo venne accettato nell'arsenale sotto la designazione di Jpz 4-5 nel 1966. Il semovente venne costruito in serie dal 1966 al 1967. Durante la sua produzione le compagnie Hanomag ed Henschel ne costruirono 385.";"Hinweis: Dieser Eintrag wird in Kürze auch auf Deutsch verfügbar sein.

column27: yeni SPG'yi Amerikan M47 Patton II'de bulunana benzer bir 90 mm antitank top ile silahlandırmak idi. 1961'de her geliştirme şirketi kendi deneysel modelini üretti. Karşılaştırmalı test ve hemde iki şirketin birleşmesi sonrasında tek bir deneysel model oluşturmak için her iki şirketten uzmanların çabalarını birleştirmeye karar verildi. Üretim sırasında Hanomag ve Henschel şirketlerinin her biri 385 araç üretti.";"由\t哈\t诺\t玛\t格\t（\t汉\t诺\t威\t机\t械\t制\t造\t公\t司\t）\t和\t亨\t舍\t尔\t（\t莱\t茵\t钢\t铁\t-\t亨\t舍\t尔\t公\t司\t）\t的\t专\t家\t提\t出\t的\t自\t行\t反\t坦\t克\t炮\t方\t案\t，\t肇\t始\t于\t 50 \t年\t代\t中\t期\t。\t

column1: \t第\t一\t辆\t样\t车\t火\t炮\t坦\t克\t歼\t击\t车\t 1-3 \t型\t于\t 1959 \t年\t出\t厂\t，\t选\t用\t HS.30 \t大\t型\t步\t兵\t战\t车\t作\t为\t底\t盘\t。\t然\t而\t测\t试\t表\t明\t，\t此\t车\t的\t缺\t陷\t十\t分\t显\t著\t。\t专\t家\t们\t旋\t即\t投\t入\t到\t改\t进\t工\t作\t之\t中\t—\t—\t将\t M47 \t“\t巴\t顿\t”\t使\t用\t的\t 90 \t毫\t米\t反\t坦\t克\t炮\t装\t至\t新\t型\t战\t车\t上\t。\t

1961\t年\t，\t两\t家\t公\t司\t研\t发\t出\t各\t自\t的\t试\t验\t车\t型\t，\t并\t交\t付\t测\t试\t。\t而\t后\t，\t两\t家\t公\t司\t实\t现\t了\t合\t并\t。\t在\t对\t比\t试\t验\t之\t后\t，\t新\t公\t司\t决\t定\t整\t合\t资\t源\t，\t专\t注\t于\t发\t展\t一\t个\t试\t验\t型\t号\t。\t研\t发\t和\t测\t试\t新\t型\t号\t的\t工\t作\t持\t续\t到\t 1965 \t年\t。\t翌\t年\t，\t在\t结\t束\t了\t所\t有\t测\t试\t后\t，\t新\t车\t被\t定\t型\t为\t火\t炮\t坦\t克\t歼\t击\t车\t 4-5 \t型\t。\t

\t哈\t诺\t玛\t格\t和\t亨\t舍\t尔\t在\t 66-67 \t年\t的\t生\t产\t中\t，\t各\t制\t造\t了\t 385 \t辆\t火\t炮\t坦\t克\t歼\t击\t车\t 4-5 \t型\t。";"1950年代の\t中頃、\tハノマーグ（ハノーファーシェ・マシネンバウ\tAG）と\tヘンシェル（ラインシュタール・ヘンシェル\tAG）の\t専門家による\t自走対戦車砲の\t架台の\t開発が\t始まりました。\t新車両の\tベースに\t選ばれたのは、\t装甲輸送車である\tラング\tHS.30歩兵戦闘車でした。\tそして、\t1959年に、\tカノーネンヤークトパンツァー\t1-3\tの\t型名を\t持つ\t自走砲最初の\t試作車両が\t製造されました。\t試験では、\t車両の\t重大な\t欠陥が\t明らかになったため、\t修正を\t目指してさらなる\t開発が\t続けられました。\t新しい\t自走砲には、\tアメリカの\tM47 パットン\tIIに\t搭載されたものに\t似た\t90mmの\t対戦車砲を\t取り\t付けることになりました。\t1961年には、\t各開発会社が\t独自に\t製造した\t2\tつの\t試作車両の\t試験が\t行われました。\t比較試験後、\t2社が\t共同して、\t1\tつの\t試作型を\t製造するため、\t両社の\t専門家の\t成果を\t融合させることに\t決まりました。\t新型の\t製造と\t試験の\t作業は\t1965年まで\t続きました。\t1996年に\t全ての\t試験が\t完了すると、\t新車両は\tJPz 4-5\tの\t型名のもとに\t配備されました。\tこの\t自走砲は、\t1966年から\t1967年まで\t連続生産されていました。\t製造期間中、\tハノマーグと\tヘンシェルはそれぞれ\t385両の\t車両を\t製造しました。";"The project to develop the self-propelled antitank mount was begun in the mid-1950s by specialists from the companies Hanomag (Hannoversche Maschinenbau AG)  and Henschel (Rheinstahl Henschel AG). The base selected for the new vehicle was the Schützenpanzer Lang HS.30 armored transporter. The first prototype of the SPG with the designation Kanonenjagdpanzer 1-3 was assembled in 1959. The tests revealed significant flaws in the vehicle. As a result
column2: more work was done to refine it. The decision was made to arm the new SPG with a 90mm antitank cannon similar to the one installed on the American M47 Patton II. By 1961 each development company had built its own experimental model. Both models were presented for testing. After comparative testing
column3: as well as the merger of the two companies
column4: the decision was made to combine the efforts of the specialists from both companies in order to build a single experimental model. Work on the creation and testing of the new model continued until 1965. After all testing was complete in 1966 the new vehicle was accepted as part of the arsenal under the designation JPz 4-5. The SPG was built serially from 1966 to 1967. During its production the companies Hanomag and Henschel each built 385 vehicles.";"The project to develop the self-propelled antitank mount was begun in the mid-1950s by specialists from the companies Hanomag (Hannoversche Maschinenbau AG)  and Henschel (Rheinstahl Henschel AG). encyclopedia/germ_panzerbefelhswagen_VI_P/desc;"The Tiger Porsche heavy tanks built by Ferdinand Porsche (Nibelungen-Werke) were developed to compete with Erwin Aders’s tanks (Henschel)
column2: but they essentially lost the competition. Most of the completed bodies equipped with track assembly and engines went toward the construction of the Ferdinand/Elefant tank destroyers.

column1: However
column2: several (at least ten) bodies of the future Porsche tank were built in 1942 and equipped with Krupp turrets. Several of these prototypes underwent testing at the Dyullerskheym training ground in the summer/fall of 1942 and were even used by the 503rd tank battalion as training vehicles.";"Le Porsche Tiger fut développé par Ferdinand Porsche (Nibelungen-Werke)
column3: en compétition avec les chars d'Erwin Aders (Henschel). Il ne reporta pas l'appel d'offre
column4: et la majorité des moteurs et systèmes de chenilles furent utilisés pour les chasseurs de chars Ferdinand / Elefant. Malgré cela
column5: au moins 10 châssis du Porsche Tiger furent assemblés et équipés avec des tourelles Krupp. Ces prototypes furent testés à Dyullerskheym à la fin de l'année 1942
column6: avant d'être utilisés par le s. Pz. Abt. 503 comme véhicule d’entrainement.";"Il carro pesante Tiger Porsche costruito da Ferdinand Porsche (Nibelungen-Werke) venne sviluppato per competere con il carro di Erwin Aders (Henschel)
column7: ma persero il concorso. La maggior parte degli scafi completati equipaggiati con cingoli e motori vennero utilizzati per costruire i cacciacarri Ferdinand/Elefant.

column1: Tuttavia
column2: alcuni (almeno dieci) scafi dei futuri carri Porsche vennero costruiti nel 1942 ed equipaggiati con torrette Krupp. Alcuni di questi prototipi vennero utilizzati nei test alla base d'addestramento di Dyullerskheym nell'estate/autunno del 1942 ed utilizzati poi dal 503° battaglione corazzati come unità d'addestramento.";"Hinweis: Dieser Eintrag wird in Kürze auch auf Deutsch verfügbar sein.

column3: однако
column4: по сути
column5: проиграли в конкурентной борьбе. Большинство уже готовых корпусов
column6: оснащённых ходовой частью и двигателями
column7: ушло на постройку ПТ САУ Ferdinand/Elefant.

column1: Однако
column2: несколько (не менее 10 единиц) корпусов будущего танка Порше были построены в 1942 году и оснащены башней Krupp. Несколько таких прототипов танка проходили испытания на полигоне Dyullerskheym летом-осенью 1942 года
column3: и даже состояли на вооружении 503-го батальона танков в качестве учебных машин.";"Zakłady Ferdinanda Porsche zaprojektowały i zbudowały prototyp czołgu ciężkiego
column4: oznaczony VK 45. 01 (P). Pojazd przegrał rywalizację z propozycją zakładów Henschel
column5: oznaczoną VK 45. 01 (H). Większość ukończonych podwozi z rozpoczętej jeszcze przed rozstrzygnięciem konkursu produkcji użyta została do budowy dział samobieżnych Ferdinand/Elefant. Jakkolwiek kilka (przynajmniej dziesięć) podwozi zbudowano w roku 1942 i wyposażono w wieże konstrukcji firmy Krupp. Pewna ilość tych pojazdów przeszła późnym latem próby w Döllersheim
column6: a nawet doczekała się użycia w 503 Batalionie Czołgów Ciężkich jako pojazdy szkoleniowe.";"Překlad připravujeme";"Tiger Porsche ağır tankları Ferninand Porsche (Nibelungen-Werke) tarafından Erwin Aders'in (Henschel) tanklarına rakip olarak üretildi. Ancak bu rekabetin sonu onlar için kaybetmekti. Paletleri ve motorları ile birlikte hazır halde bulunan tank gövdelerinin çoğu Ferdinand/Elefant tanklarının üretiminde kullanıldı.

column1: Geleceğin Porsche tankı için üretilen birkaç (en az on) tank gövdesi 1942 yılında üretilmiş ve Krupp taretleri ile donatılmıştı. Bu prototiplerin çoğu Dyullerskheym eğitim alanında test edildi. Hatta 1942 yılının yaz/sonbahar zamanlarında 503'üncü tank taburu tarafından eğitim araçları olarak kullanıldı.";"斐\t迪\t南\t·\t波\t尔\t舍\t（\t尼\t伯\t龙\t根\t工\t厂\t）\t的\t重\t型\t坦\t克\t最\t终\t不\t敌\t埃\t尔\t温\t·\t阿\t德\t斯\t（\t亨\t舍\t尔\t公\t司\t）\t的\t设\t计\t。\t因\t此\t，\t大\t多\t数\t已\t完\t工\t的\t底\t盘\t被\t改\t为\t“\t斐\t迪\t南\t”\t/\t“\t象\t”\t式\t自\t行\t反\t坦\t克\t炮\t。\t

\t但\t在\t 1942 \t年\t，\t仍\t有\t少\t量\t（\t至\t少\t十\t辆\t）\t装\t有\t克\t虏\t伯\t炮\t塔\t的\t虎\t（\tP\t）\t出\t厂\t。\t夏\t秋\t之\t际\t，\t部\t分\t样\t车\t被\t运\t抵\t德\t勒\t斯\t海\t姆\t训\t练\t场\t接\t受\t测\t试\t。\t第\t 503 \t重\t装\t甲\t营\t也\t曾\t短\t暂\t地\t装\t备\t过\t此\t车\t。";"ポルシェティーガー\t重戦車は、\tフェルディナンド・ポルシェ\t博士が\tヘンシェル\t社の\t開発した\t戦車に\t対抗するために\t開発された。\tしかし\tポルシェティーガーは\t試験に\t不合格となった。\t既に\tエンジンと\t履帯を\t装備した\t車体は\tエレファント/フェルディナント\t重駆逐戦車の\t生産に\t使用された。\t

しかしいくつかの (少なくとも\t10両) 車体は\tクルップ\t砲塔を\t搭載し、\t1942年の\t夏/秋に\tDyullerskheym\t試験場で\t試験を\t受け、\t第\t503戦車大隊の\t訓練用車両として\t用いられた。";"The Tiger Porsche heavy tanks built by Ferdinand Porsche (Nibelungen-Werke) were developed to compete with Erwin Aders’s tanks (Henschel)
column2: but they essentially lost the competition. Most of the completed bodies equipped with track assembly and engines went toward the construction of the Ferdinand/Elefant tank destroyers.

encyclopedia/germ_panzerwerfer_42/desc;"A modified Nb.Wf.41 ten-barreled rocket-propelled mine-thrower was installed on the adapted chassis of an Opel Maultier tractor trailer enclosed in armor. It was developed in 1942. During its production from 1943 to 1944 about 300 mounts were released. They were widely used by the Wehrmacht. Due to the use of a mine-stabilization system based on rotation
column2: a higher degree of accuracy and lower spread was achieved than that of rocket-propelled projectiles with tailfin stabilization systems.";"Un lance-roquettes Nb.Wf.41 modifié et installé sur un châssis d'Opel Maultier
column3: fermé par des plaques de blindage. Développé en 1942
column4: il sera produit à environ 300 exemplaires entre 1943 et 1944 et largement utilisé par la Wehrmacht. Le système de stabilisation des roquettes étant basées sur la rotation
column5: une grande précision était possible en comparaison avec les lance-roquettes stabilisés avec des ailettes.";"Un Nb.Wf.41 lancia-mine propulse a razzo a 10 canne fu installato sullo chassis di un trattore d'artiglieria Opel Maultier corazzato. Fu sviluppato nel 1942. La produzione avvenne tra il 1943 e il 1944 con circa 300 unità prodotte. Furono ampiamente utilizzati dalla Wehrmacht. Grazie a un sistema di stabilizzazione basato sulla rotazione furono ottenuti un grado di precisione maggiori e una minore dispersione rispetto alle granate propulse a razzo con sistemi di stabilizzazione a pinne.";"Hinweis: Dieser Eintrag wird in Kürze auch auf Deutsch verfügbar sein.
